item.title: Trend Micro advises Windows users to update their operating system to safeguard against the Winshock bug
item.description:
A recently discovered flaw in Microsoft Windows has Trend Micro urging all Windows users to immediately update their systems. The issue exists in Microsoft’s data transfer platform, which is designed for secure communication. Trend Micro warns that users who don’t update are highly vulnerable to attacks, potentially allowing hackers to take control of their systems without any user interaction. This bug, nicknamed “Winshock,” received a severity score of 9.3 out of 10 from the Common Vulnerability Scoring System...

item.title: Fishbat provides commentary on the latest developments in iOS8 and the introduction of Apple Pay
item.description:
Apple, the tech giant, recently launched the first beta version of iOS 8.1. This upgrade comes shortly after the release of iOS 8.0.2, which was itself a fix for a bug found in the recently launched iOS 8.0.1. This new beta version offers several new features: A redesigned icon for iBooks. An option to enable dictation within the keyboard settings. Updated application permission settings. Larger application icons specifically designed for the new widgets in the notification center...
